thread.title: BRIEF-Applied Optoelectronics Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.89

title: BRIEF-Applied Optoelectronics Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.89
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Applied Optoelectronics Inc:
* APPLIED OPTOELECTRONICS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.89
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.28 * Q4 REVENUE $79.9 MILLION VERSUS $84.9 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $67 MILLION TO $71 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.28 TO $0.34
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.83, REVENUE VIEW $85.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* APPLIED OPTOELECTRONICS - ‚Äç CONTINUE TO EXPECT H2 2018 TO BE STRONGER THAN H1 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
